plot: Thiago is in love with a girl who appears every night in his dreams. Obsessed with the desire to meet her, the boy can no longer sleep.
title: Garota Explosiva
plot_es: Thiago is in love with a girl who appears every night in his dreams. Obsessed with the desire to meet her, the boy can no longer sleep.
plot_en: Thiago is in love with a girl who appears every night in his dreams. Obsessed with the desire to meet her, the boy can no longer sleep.
